mission: Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu with lightning effects crashes through Knesset walls. CRASH! 'I am eternal!' Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke. WHOOSH! Coalition deals with exploding panels. BOOM! Juggling multiple corruption trials while texting. ZAP! Building settlements with energy beams. THWACK! Judicial reform controversy splits the nation. CRACK! 'Bibi will return... again!' WHAM! Israeli flag with lightning bolts.

script_processing.original_script: Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu crashes through Knesset walls with lightning effects. CRASH! 'I am eternal!' Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke. WHOOSH! Coalition deals explode with panels. BOOM! He juggles corruption trials while texting. ZAP! Settlements are built with energy beams. THWACK! The nation is split. Judicial reform controversy cracks the land. CRACK! 'Bibi will return... again!' WHAM! The Israeli flag crackles with lightning bolts. A true comic book saga.
script_processing.final_script: A Marvel Comics-style explosion erupts! Benjamin Netanyahu bursts through the Knesset walls, lightning crackling around him. CRASH! He proclaims, "I am eternal!" Opposition parties vanish in a puff of comic smoke. WHOOSH! Coalition deals explode in a flurry of panels. BOOM! Amidst the chaos, he juggles corruption trials while texting. ZAP! Settlements rise swiftly, constructed by energy beams. THWACK! The nation is deeply divided. Judicial reform sparks deep cracks in the land. CRACK! A voice booms, "Bibi will return... again!" WHAM! The Israeli flag crackles with intense lightning. This is a true comic book saga of political power
